# Jinqiu Capital (锦秋基金)

> 锦秋基金是一家双币早期投资机构，长期投资勇敢的科技创业者，助力其造就伟大公司。

## About
- Website: https://jinqiucapital.com
- Contact: ai@jinqiucapital.com
- Location: China

## What We Do
We are an early-stage venture capital fund focusing on technology startups. We invest in brave tech entrepreneurs and help them build great companies.

## Content Structure
- `/` - Homepage with company intro, team, and portfolio
- `/library/jinqiu-select` - Jinqiu Select: Research reports and analysis
- `/library/jinqiu-scan` - Jinqiu Scan: Product reviews and tool evaluations
- `/library/jinqiu-spotlight` - Jinqiu Spotlight: Founder interviews
- `/library/jinqiu-roundtable` - Jinqiu Roundtable: Dinner gatherings
- `/library/jinqiu-summit` - Jinqiu Summit: Conference events

## API Endpoints (for AI/Machines)
- `/api/content` - Company data (team, portfolio) in JSON
- `/api/wechat/articles` - Articles from WeChat Official Account
- `/api/wechat/articles?category=jinqiu-select` - Filtered by category

## Data Format
All APIs return JSON with this structure:
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": { ... }
}
```

## Sitemap
See `/sitemap.xml` for all pages.

## Language
Content is available in both Chinese (zh) and English (en).
Toggle via `?lang=zh` or `?lang=en` query parameter.
